src:
Bek Timnas U-16 Alfin Lestaluhu Tutup Usia
01 Nov 2019, 02:28 by Anggi Tiar


Bek Timnas U-16 Alfin Lestaluhu Tutup Usia

KBRN, Jakarta : Kabar duka menyelimuti sepak bola Tanah Air. Ya, pemain Timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu dikabarkan meninggal dunia. Kabar tersebut diketahui dari Media Officer PSSI sekalius Timnas Indonesia, Bandung Saputra. "Innalilahi wainailahi rojiun. Telah berpulang ke Allah SWT sdr Alfi Lestaluhu, pemain timnas U-16," ucap Bandung dalam pesan singkat kepada wartawan yang tergabung dalam PSSI Pers, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam WIB. Dikabarkan, bek Timnas Indonesia U-16 itu menghembuskan napas terakhirnya sekitar pukul 22.11 WIB di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam. Alfin sempat dirawat di rumah sakit tersebut setelah sebelumnya menjadi salah satu korban gempa yang mengguncang Ambon 26 September lalu. Pemain yang sempat membela Timnas Indonesia di Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-16 2020 itu sempat dilakukan perawatan di rumah sakit Ambon, sebelum akhirnya dibawa PSSI ke Jakarta untuk mendapatka perawatan lebih baik sejak awal Oktober lalu. Akan tetapi, kondisi Alfin tak kunjung membaik, hingga akhirnya ia harus mengembuskan napas terakhirnya di usia 15 tahun.
text:
U-16 national team defender Alfin Lestaluhu dies
Nov 01 2019, 02:28 by Anggi Tiar


U-16 national team defender Alfin Lestaluhu dies

KBRN, Jakarta: The sad news surrounds Indonesian soccer. Yes, Indonesian U-16 national team player Alfin Lestaluhu is reported to have died. The news is known from the PSSI Media Officer at once Indonesian National Team, Bandung Saputra. "Innalilahi wainailahi rojiun. Has passed away to Allah SWT Br Alfi Lestaluhu, U-16 national team players," said Bandung in a short message to reporters who were members of PSSI Press, Thursday (10/31/2019) evening WIB. Reportedly, the U-16 Indonesian national team defender was exhaled last at around 22.11 WIB at the Harapan Kita Hospital Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019) night. Alfin was treated at the hospital after being one of the victims of the earthquake that rocked Ambon on 26 September. The player who had defended the Indonesian national team in the AFC U-16 2020 Qualification Cup had a chance to be treated at Ambon hospital, before being brought by PSSI to Jakarta to get better treatment since early October. However, Alfin's condition did not improve, until finally he had to exhale his last at the age of 15 years.
